name: NewAndFarProject (Demo game)
description:
This is a demo made for people to test my game and help me develop this game.

Please support this game by joining my Discord server and leave some of your suggestions for the game. You can also receive updates there.

Join my server here: https://discord.gg/AjrJWwhVT6
